mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM boards_categories bc WHERE bc.isdelete = 'active'

SELECT bc.bbs_cate_cd, bc.bbs_cate_nm, COUNT(b.bbs_no) AS board_count, bc.reg_ymd FROM boards_categories bc LEFT JOIN boards b ON bc.bbs_cate_cd = b.bbs_cate_cd WHERE bc.isdelete = 'active' GROUP BY bc.bbs_cate_cd, bc.bbs_cate_nm
ORDER BY CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(bc.bbs_cate_cd,'bbs_cate_',-1) AS UNSIGNED)
SELECT bbs_cate_cd, bbs_cate_nm FROM boards_categories WHERE bbs_cate_cd = #{categoryCode}
